contentrichtext.text: {{cleanup|reason=Doesn't adhere to the [[WP:Manual of style|Manual of Style]]|date=January 2012}} {{ref improve|date=January 2012}} {{Infobox musical artist | name = Zacky Vengeance | image = Zacky Vengeance (2007).jpg | caption = Zacky Vengeance in 2007 | image_size = | background = non_vocal_instrumentalist | birth_name = Zachary James Baker<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.radianteclipse.com/Avenged-Sevenfold/Zacky-Vengeance |title=Zacky Vengeance |publisher=Radianteclipse.com |date=1981-12-11 |accessdate=2011-12-08}}</ref> | alias = Zacky Vengeance | birth_place = [[Huntington Beach, California]], [[United States]] | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1981|12|11}} | instrument = [[Guitar]], [[bass guitar|bass]], [[vocals]] | genre = [[Hard rock]], [[heavy metal music|heavy metal]], [[metalcore]], [[punk rock]] | occupation = [[Musician]] | years_active = 1999â€“present | label = [[Warner Bros. Records|Warner Bros.]], [[Hopeless Records|Hopeless]], [[Good Life Recordings]] | associated_acts = [[Avenged Sevenfold]] | notable_instruments = [[Schecter Guitar Research|Schecter Zacky Vengeance 6661]] }} '''Zacky Vengeance''', (born '''Zachary James Baker''' ; December 11, 1981) is the [[rhythm guitar]]ist and [[backing vocalist]] for the American [[heavy metal music|metal]]/[[rock music|rock]] band [[Avenged Sevenfold]]. ==Biography== [[File:Avenged-Sevenfold-BergenCalling-2011-Christian Misje-5503.jpg|thumb|left|Zacky Vengeance with Synyster Gates live in Bergen, Norway - 2011]] Baker attended [[Huntington Beach High School]], and formed Avenged Sevenfold there with [[M. Shadows]] and [[The Rev]]. Before Avenged Sevenfold, his first band was a [[crust punk]] band called Society Down. He's said before that a demo exists, but lost it years ago. After Society Down, he formed a [[punk rock|punk]] band called ''MPA*'', which stands for Mad Porno Action. He implied that they were both not successful. Baker came up with his stage name "Zacky Vengeance" because he wanted to get back at all the people from his youth who doubted his potential. He also came up with Jonathan Seward's stage name "[[Johnny Christ]]," saying it suited him. Vengeance was also responsible for the creation of the initialism "[[A7X]]".<ref>''[[All Excess]]'', Avenged Sevenfold DVD (2007)</ref> Despite playing the guitar left handed, Vengeance recalls the first guitar he learned to play on was actually a right-handed his parents had bought him for his thirteenth birthday. He learned by playing upside-down, watching his favorite bands and other people he knew who played, and practiced as much as he could. He would also read each edition of ''[[Guitar World]]'' cover to cover, learning the tabs of the songs published there and watching the professionals perform them until he could play them.{{Citation needed|date=October 2010}} ==Equipment== ===Guitars=== *Schecter Zacky Vengeance 6661 loaded with Floyd Rose *Schecter Zacky Vengeance 6661 *Schecter Zacky Vengeance Blade (new in 2009) *Schecter S-1 *Schecter S-1 Elite *Schecter Zacky Vengeance Mirror guitar *Fender Telecasters *Gibson SG All models are loaded with Seymour Duncan JB Pickups. *Schecter Acoustic Guitar (on "[[So Far Away (Avenged Sevenfold song)|So Far Away]]") *Ovation Acoustic Guitar (on "[[Seize the Day (song)|Seize the Day]]" and "Dear God") ===Amplifiers and effects unit=== ;Amplifier *Jet City JCA100H *Marshall JVM205H 50 watt model *Marshall JCM800 head *Marshall Cabinet 4x12 *Marshall 1960B 4x12 cab *Mesa Boogie Dual Rectifier ;Effects unit *Boss TU-2 Chromatic Tuner *Boss NS-2 Noise Suppressor *Boss RV-5 Digital Reverb *Boss GT-8 *ISP Decimator noise gate *Visual Sound H2O Liquid Chours *Line 6 Tonecore Coise Constrictor *Line 6 DL4 Delay Modeler *Line 6 PODxt Pro *Ibanez LF7 *Seymour Duncan SFX-01 Pickup Booster *Voodoo Lab PEDAL POWER 2 *Voodoo Lab GCX Audio Switcher ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * {{Official website|http://www.vengenz.com}} *[http://www.avengedsevenfold.com Avenged
